meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a tomboy.
meanings.sent1: Her tomboyish haircut and love for sports made her stand out among the other girls.
meanings.sent2: She preferred wearing jeans and sneakers, giving her a tomboyish look.
meanings.sent3: The tomboyish girl climbed trees with such ease that even the boys were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her tomboyish spirit soared as she fearlessly tackled every challenge that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The tomboyish nature of her personality shone through in her adventurous spirit.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics typically associated with boys.
meanings.sent1: His tomboyish behavior, like playing rough sports, surprised his classmates.
meanings.sent2: The tomboyish girl excelled in activities like skateboarding and tree climbing.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the tomboyish puppy trying to keep up with the bigger dogs.
meanings.sent4: Her tomboyish attitude towards challenges made her a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The tomboyish energy in the room was palpable as the girls raced around with abandon.
